item.title: Report X-2024020425
item.description:
Report X-2024020425

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-21
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to unload trailer 955930 and pkg was on ground leaking and outer carton was wet. DescribePack: Inner closures came loose and the barcode was not readable had to get tracking # off the OP-900 and pkg. was placed inside hazmat cage inside the tote upside down after it was damaged. DurationRel: 13 and MitigateEffect: Closures came loose and liquid leaked out soiling inner bottles and outer carton.

item.title: Report X-2024020600
item.description:
Report X-2024020600

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-11
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called out for an Admin's assistance in containing the damaged hazmat. DescribePack: One of the four bottles in this shipment had a loose cap, which in turn caused that bottle to leak half of its contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The responding Admin contained the shipment in a hazardous material spill tote and transported it to the hazmat cage for processing.

item.title: Report X-2024020783
item.description:
Report X-2024020783

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: GLENWOOD SPRINGS
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package pulled off trailer, loaded correctly with orientation arrows upwards and in correct hazmat loading area. The box was leaking a powder substance out and was placed into a hazmat bin for further evaluation. DescribePack: The inner plastic salvage drum was cracked inside packaging. The crack was located on the side wall of plastic drum and was around 2-3 inches long. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: It was placed into a hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2024020394
item.description:
Report X-2024020394

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-18
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation and sent to QA. DescribePack: Thin plastic jugs in corrugated carton. One jug punctured at bottom corner (1/8 inch long tear in plastic) and spilled, soiling other jugs and damaging carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package sent to QA.

DescribePack: The closure came loose and liquid leaked out soiling label and outer product. item.title: Report X-2024020520
item.description:
Report X-2024020520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-23
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE ARRIVED TO STATION LEAKING. PACKAGE DISCOVERED BY PACKAGE HANDLER DURING UNLOADING. UNLOAD MANAGER INFORMED. MANAGER INFORMS QA. DescribePack: LOOSE CAP ON JERRICAN DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: UNLOAD MANGER INFORM ABOUT SPILLAGE. QA INFORM ABOUT SPILLAGE, SDS SEARCHED ON INTERNET. PACKAGE BAGGED IN PLASTIC AND PUT INTO TOTE.GLOVES USED TO CLEAN UP SPILLAGE WITH PAPER TOWEL AND PUT INTO TOTE WITH ALL CONTAMINATED MATERIAL USE FOR CLEAN UP.

item.title: Report X-2024020240
item.description:
Report X-2024020240

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-09
  • City: BROOMFIELD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During outbound, at 9:50pm, a load 2 manger found a leaking hazmat on the IC belt near door V141. The manager placed it in a plastic bag and bin and called QA. QA picked up hazmat and placed it in hazmat cage. DescribePack: There is a crack underneath the handle of the hazmat. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a plastic bag and bin.
